verses.verse: My <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2254>consumed<s%>, my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2193>extinct<s%>, The grave is ready for <S%H6913>me<s%>.
Surely there are <S%H2049>mockers<s%> with <S%H5869>me<s%>, And mine eye <S%H3885>dwelleth<s%> upon their <S%H4784>provocation<s%>.
Give <S%H7760><s%> now a <S%H6148>pledge<s%>, be surety for me with <S%H8628>thyself<s%>; Who is there that will strike hands with <S%H3027>me<s%>?
For thou hast <S%H6845>hid<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H7922>understanding<s%>: Therefore shalt thou not exalt <S%H7311>them<s%>.
He that <S%H5046>denounceth<s%> his <S%H7453>friends<s%> for a <S%H2506>prey<s%>, Even the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%>.
But he hath <S%H3322>made<s%> me a <S%H4914>byword<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; And <S%H6440>they<s%> spit in my <S%H8611>face<s%>.
Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> also is <S%H3543>dim<s%> by reason of <S%H3708>sorrow<s%>, And all my <S%H3338>members<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow<s%>.
Upright <S%H3477><s%> men shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at <S%H5355>this<s%>, And the innocent shall stir <S%H5782>up<s%> himself against the <S%H2611>godless<s%>.
Yet shall the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> on his <S%H1870>way<s%>, And he that hath <S%H2890>clean<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H3254>wax<s%> stronger and <S%H555>stronger<s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> as for you <S%H7725>all<s%>, come on <S%H935>now<s%> <S%H4672>again<s%>; And I shall not find a wise man among <S%H2450>you<s%>.
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H5674>past<s%>, my <S%H2154>purposes<s%> are broken <S%H5423>off<s%>, Even the <S%H4180>thoughts<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%>.
They <S%H7760>change<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> into <S%H3117>day<s%>: The <S%H216>light<s%>, say <S%H7138>they<s%>, is near <S%H6440>unto<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
If I <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> as my <S%H1004>house<s%>; If I have <S%H7502>spread<s%> my <S%H3326>couch<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>;
If I have <S%H7121>said<s%> to <S%H7845>corruption<s%>, Thou art my <S%H1>father<s%>; To the <S%H7415>worm<s%>, Thou art my <S%H517>mother<s%>, and my <S%H269>sister<s%>;
Where then <S%H645>is<s%> my <S%H8615>hope<s%>? And as for my <S%H8615>hope<s%>, who shall see <S%H7789>it<s%>?
It shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H905>bars<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, When once there is <S%H5183>rest<s%> <S%H3162>in<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
